author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

As a follow-up of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40323, start adding some test code to run validation workflow on Phase-2 data.

#### PR validation:

Run successfully  `scramv1 b runtests_GeneralTrackAnalyser`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: apply necessary changes to test the phase-2 AlCaReco workflow
